alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:05PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chesterfield County through 445 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cheraw State Park, or near Cheraw, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheraw, Chesterfield, Cheraw State Park, Cheraw Municipal Airport, Northeastern Technical College, Society Hill, Patrick, McFarlan, Cheraw Fish Hatchery and Chesterfield Detention Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
